mapper.select: /* mapper.mc.dcSafeDashMapper : selectSafeDashList */ SELECT SAFE_DT, round( (PROBE1 - 32) * 5.0 / 9 , 2) as PROBE1, (500-PROBE1) as PROBE11, round( (PROBE2 - 32) * 5.0 / 9 ,2) as PROBE2, (500-PROBE2) as PROBE22, round( (PROBE3 - 32) * 5.0 / 9 ,2) as PROBE3, (500-PROBE3) as PROBE33, round( (PROBE4 - 32) * 5.0 / 9 ,2) as PROBE4, (500-PROBE4) as PROBE44 FROM GJ_DS.DC_SAFE_DASH
